title: PMR (Short)
summary: Progressive muscle relaxation to release tension.
safety_notes: Avoid painful tensing if injured. Breathe lightly; stop if dizzy.

offCopy.intro: We'll gently tense then release key muscle groups to downshift your body.

steps.label: Face
steps.body: Raise eyebrows & tighten eyes for 5s, release for 10s.

steps.label: Legs
steps.body: Press feet into floor for 5s, release for 10s.

offCopy.completion: Notice the heaviness and warmth. Carry this calm into your next step.

verseKJV.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

light.prompt: Offer your tension to the Lord as you release.

verseKJV.text: And the peace of God... shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

disciple.identity: You are held by Christ's peace.

verseKJV.text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

kingdom.commission: Rest equips you to serve well.
